title: Average ticket wait time?
body: Heyo. I'm just wondering what the average ticket wait times are these days. I aint rushing anything. I would just like to know since I think my main account was compromised. (My own fault for needing time away to study) If anyone knows what the time for a specialist that would be most handy. I did do a stupid move yesterday and add move info so...yeah. I would like to go back into the game and enjoy it again. Ah well till then back to the waiting game.

replies.body: wait time is about 8 hours. Recently riot randomly banned a ton of people by mistake so the problem is trying to get solved and everyone is messaging them. My wait time was about 8 hours each reply.
P.S. i dont think they will be solving this one. Remeber, its a free game unless you make it otherwise. We are all at risk :/

It can vary depending on the team!  Our queues aren't too high right now so it shouldn't take long.  If you've waited for a bit, I'm happy to check on your status if you've got a ticket number.  I hope that helps!
